issues.description: The solution implements getTotalNumberOfStudents with a boolean parameter `includeGuests`, but the problem statementâ€™s UML and tasks specify a no-argument method `getTotalNumberOfStudents()`. This mismatch will prevent students from matching the required signature and writing code that passes the intended tests.
issues.suggested_fix: Update the solution (and template stub) to define getTotalNumberOfStudents without parameters (public int getTotalNumberOfStudents()), or revise the problem statement and UML to include the boolean parameter if that behavior is intended.
